response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This product is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to share it with you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,250,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value, making it an exceptional investment for you. I believe that this offer presents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 1250000}
